title: All female champs mission made a mess!!
body: So.. New mission. Win a game whit all female champs.This mission made a mess.Every iother game i would run up to someone taht want taht misiion so bad They woulkd troll.And troll hard.Like riot what do i do?I want to doge a game but you will get me suspended for dogeing a lot. Plese do something

replies.body: I see...now re-write all that in English.
Tell others to win 3 games instead.
winning 1 game is hard enough, now you're expecting me to win 3? That's too much to ask of me :(

https://i.imgur.com/u17Zux0.png

See the part below **-- OR --**?

Just win 3 short games (ARAM games almost always end that quickly) and don't worry about the 5 female team.

> [{quoted}](name=Ice Weasel X,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WMV8VcB5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-10T08:53:32.116+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/u17Zux0.png
> 
> See the part below **-- OR --**?
> 
> Just win 3 short games (ARAM games almost always end that quickly) and don't worry about the 5 female team.

"We're not Sirens" holy shit the official Riot BM at a former team...

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=WMV8VcB5,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2018-11-10T09:32:17.669+0000)
>
> "We're not Sirens" holy shit the official Riot BM at a former team...

Oh, that.  I Photoshopped that as a joke a few days ago.  It was just easier for me to link the image since I already had it available.
